DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the experiences and perceptions of District VI pediatric clinicians on parental vaccine hesitancy and vaccine refusal.
DOC.brief_title: Vaccine Hesitancy: A Survey of Pediatric Clinicians
DOC.detailed_description: This is a retrospective, convenience sample, descriptive study. Participants will be asked to complete a web-based survey on parental vaccine hesitancy/ vaccine refusal. Survey responses are primarily categorical. Frequencies and averages will be reported using group statistics.
DOC.criteria: Members of District VI American Academy of Pediatrics NonEnglish speaking/reading
